summary: A woman and her daughter struggle to make their way through the aftermath of the Bosnian War.
cast: Mirjana Karanovic|Luna Zimic Mijovic|Leon Lucev|Kenan Catic|Jasna Beri|Dejan Acimovic|Bogdan Diklic|Emir Hadzihafizbegovic|Ermin Bravo|Semka Sokolovic-Bertok|Maike Höhne|Jasna Zalica|Nada Djurevska|Emina Muftic|Dunja Pasic|Sedina Muhibic|Sabina Turulja|Vanessa Glodjo|Sanja Buric|Hasija Boric|Mirza Tanovic|Hendrik Massute|Hasiba Agic|Mirsad Comaga|Enis Avdic|Ana Jovanovic|Vanesa Glodo
title: Grbavica
